Frequently Asked Questions
What is Divipay?
Divipay is a simple and fast app that helps you split bills and expenses with friends and family. No more complicated math or awkward conversations!
How do I create a new group?
From the home screen, tap the "+" button to create a new group. You can then add members and start adding expenses.
Can I use Divipay for multiple currencies?
Currently, Divipay supports a single currency per group. You can create a new group for each currency you need.
Is my data secure?
Yes, we take your privacy and data security seriously. All your information is encrypted and stored securely.
How do I settle a bill?
When a member has paid their share, you can mark the transaction as settled within the group details. The app will keep a record of all settled and outstanding balances.
